data.expected_result: It should let you chat with the new chat pin feature
data.short_description: The "Click ] to chat" feature does not work on Nordic keyboards, it does nothing. [Nordic physical keyboard specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - Own a Nordic keyboard - Use Swedish/Danish/Norwegian as keyboard settings in Windows - Try to click Shift + 9 (which usually should trigger ] since its a key combo for Nordic users) - Observe how the overlay does not let you chat
